鹼化.definition: to make basic or alkaline; alkalization (chemistry)

鹼土金屬.definition: alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)

鹼基互補配對.pinyin: jiǎn jī hù bǔ pèi duì
鹼基互補配對.definition: complementary base pairing e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA

鹼基配對.definition: base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA); base pair

鹼式鹽.definition: alkali salt (soda, lye, calcium carbonate etc)

鹼水.definition: lye water; alkaline water (used in cooking)

鹼水麵包.definition: bread made with a lye solution; (esp.) pretzel
